item.description: Recently, I published a blog article about making Use Of Chrome&rsquo;s Ozone-GBM Intel Graphics Support On The Linux Desktop.

item.title: My major contributions to Chromium project
item.description: I have been working on Chromium project since 2013 and fixed many bugs and implemented some features.

item.title: Ozone-Wayland
item.description: Ozone-Wayland is an Ozone implementation of Chromium, which allows to run Crosswalk and Chromium browser natively on Wayland without any X11 dependence[1].
